```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, include=F}
library(tidyverse)
flights <- read_csv("https://files.osf.io/v1/resources/3z5as4pej8/providers/osfstorage/5a8ca28f57103100104584db")

```

```{r}
flights <- filter(flights,ORIGIN=="DEN" | DEST=="DEN")
head(flights)
summary(flights)

```
```{r}
trial <- flights[1,]
trial
year = trial$YEAR
month = trial$MONTH
day = trial$DAY_OF_MONTH

string <- paste(year, month, day, sep="/")
string
date <- as.Date(string)
date
weekdays(date)
```
